name: swagger2-koa
description: Koa 2 middleware for loading, parsing and validating requests via swagger2
author: Carl Ansley

scripts.version: npm run dist && git add -A dist
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && tsc typings/main.d.ts src/index.ts src/typings.d.ts -m commonjs --outDir dist --sourcemap --target es6 -d --pretty --noImplicitAny
scripts.clean: rm -rf build && rm -rf typings && rm -rf coverage && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.lint: tslint -c tslint.json src/*.ts src/**/*.ts src/**/**/*.ts src/**/**/**/*.ts
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && node --harmony --harmony_default_parameters --harmony_destructuring node_modules/.bin/_mocha --require expectations $(find build -name '*.spec.js')
scripts.cover: npm run build && npm run cover:istanbul && npm run cover:remap
scripts.cover:browser: npm run cover && istanbul report html && open coverage/coverage-remapped/index.html
scripts.cover:istanbul: rm -rf ./coverage && node --harmony --harmony_default_parameters --harmony_destructuring node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover _mocha -- --require expectations $(find build -name '*.spec.js')
scripts.cover:remap: remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.raw.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped.json && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.raw.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped.lcov -t lcovonly && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.raw.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped -t html
